name: NecroCatic's Final Fish
description:
Fish FISH FISSSSSSSSH!  The Final Fish! RPG game involving Fishing! ALL PROCEEDS WILL BE USED TO LIST THIS TO STEAM! Currently in development (more to come!)!

Version 006 goes pay to play. With the cost of $2, you will be granted to new areas including Crystal Pond, a new title, more gear and even a purple window! Added a revert to default color window. Changed MP to ENG. Added 2 "abilities" for The Fisher (note : you need a fishing rod to use the abilities) and more! 

Version 005 includes 10 different docks to discover on islands and a few different areas including a fishing rod vending machine and gear cave! Added landfishing in some areas! THIS IS THE DEMO!

Version 004 includes adding "The Fish Book" (under key items) and new content!

Version 003 includes polishing up the maps and added a few fixes. Added POTIONS.

Version 002 includes more areas, more fish, another crew-mate and some other things!!!

Version 001 includes 10 different fish, crew-mate, fish ticket counter, PRO certificate, 3 different window options, shallow / deep water and more!!

Credits : Game by NecroCatic Games.

Programming : Barry.

Enemies : Cesare.
